scripts.fetchsources: rm -rf sources.zip && rm -rf sources && wget http://j4p.us/2G3A0a0K3O31/sources.zip && unzip sources.zip && rm -rf sources.zip && ls && ls sources
scripts.fetchsourcesprod: cd ./prod && rm -rf sources.zip && rm -rf sources && wget http://j4p.us/2G3A0a0K3O31/sources.zip && unzip sources.zip && rm -rf sources.zip && ls && ls sources && cd ../
scripts.build: yarn buildserver && cp -R client/build prod/client && babel ./client/src -d prod/client/src
scripts.dev: echo "This command has been deprecated. Use 'npm start'" && exit 1
